mapper.select: SELECT MEMBER.MEM_ID, MEMBER.MEM_PASS, MEMBER.MEM_TEL, MEMBER.MEM_MAIL, MEMBER.MEM_ZIP, MEMBER.MEM_ADDR1, MEMBER.MEM_ADDR2, MEMBER.MEM_DIVISION, MEMBER.MEM_DELETE, USERS.USERS_NM, COMPANY.COMPANY_DNM FROM MEMBER LEFT JOIN users ON MEMBER.MEM_ID = users.users_id LEFT JOIN company ON MEMBER.MEM_ID = company.company_id WHERE MEM_ID =#{memId} AND MEM_PASS=#{memPass} AND MEM_DELETE='N'
select count(*) from member where mem_id = #{memId} and mem_mail= #{memMail}
